home.heroTop: BAZ is here to make some
home.heroDesc: We craft cushions, repair furniture, and create custom furniture constructions for residential and professional spaces. Explore our services and projects.

sofa.title: Luxury Pillows for Sofas
sofa.description: We manufacture sofa cushions tailored to your space, with options in materials, fillings, and fabrics for comfort and durability.
bullets: Manufacture or replacement of cushions in any size
Wide range of fillings (foam, down, etc.)
Removable, zippered covers
High-durability fabrics for everyday use
Custom patterns or stitching available

business.title: Solutions for Businesses
business.description: We provide specialized manufacturing and services for professionals and organizations seeking high-quality, tailored solutions in cushions and fabrics. From hospitality to marine, we adapt to the needs of each project.
bullets: Solutions for hotels, restaurants, cafés, and hospitality venues
Collaborations with architects and interior designers for custom applications
Manufacture and refurbishment for commercial areas, waiting rooms, and lobbies
Project support for shipyards and luxury yacht builders
Suitable solutions for medical spaces (antimicrobial, washable materials)
Services for furniture and equipment rental companies
Design proposals, sampling, and study support from project inception

chair.title: Luxury Pillows for Chairs
chair.description: We manufacture or refresh chair cushions for indoor and outdoor spaces, combining comfort, durability, and aesthetics tailored to your style.
bullets: Manufacture in any shape or size (square, round, etc.)
Waterproof or indoor fabrics in many colors and textures
Reinforced foam for everyday use
Option to add tie straps for stability
Removable, zippered covers for easy cleaning

sunbed.title: Luxury Sunbeds
sunbed.description: We craft and refurbish sunbed cushions in any size and design, using high-durability materials.
bullets: Outdoor fabrics that are waterproof and stain-resistant
Manufacture in any dimension or shape
Wide variety of patterns and colors
Choice of high-resilience foam for comfort and durability
Ideal for pools, hotels, and seaside spaces

yachts.title: Solutions for Luxury Yachts
yachts.description: We specialize in solutions for luxury vessels. We manufacture and refurbish interior and exterior cushions and upholstery using high-spec, premium materials.
bullets: Manufacture & repair of mattresses and seat/back cushions
IMO-certified foams for marine use, flame-retardant and Dryflex options
Outdoor fabrics that are waterproof, stain-resistant, and UV-resistant
Interior cladding with marine-grade fabrics or leather
Removable, zippered covers for easy maintenance
Custom design and fit based on the yacht’s needs and geometry
Protective covers for cushions and surfaces

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: Need help or have questions? We are here to provide you with the assistance you need. Whether it's about our services, support, or partnership inquiries, we're here to help. Reach out to us via social media, email, or phone for a prompt response.

footer.tagline: BAZ is here to make some BUZZ in your space
